page.description: Drop the index named from table specified in the currently connected database.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = DropIndex(TableName as C, IndexName as C, [TableOwner as C])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: TableName
argument.description: The name of the table containing the index.

argument.name: IndexName
argument.description: The name of the index to delete.

argument.name: TableOwner
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The owner of the table.

page.discussion: The DropIndex() method drops the named index from the table specified in the currently connected database.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection dim sql_statement as C sql_statement = "drop database northwinds" if .not. conn.open("{A5API=Access, FileName='C:\Databases\Northwind\northwind.mdb', UserName='Admin'}") then ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.DropIndex("Customers", "ContactName") then ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end if conn.close()
